title: 如何获取玩家手上物品
author: CarbonPaper99

replies.author: liach
replies.txt_content: EntityPlayer#getHeldItem(EnumHand) 方法。一般是Main Hand。不要用getActiveItemStack 或 getActiveHand，有时会返回null

replies.author: CarbonPaper99

replies.txt_content:
PumpkinSever 发表于 2018-7-11 09:08
那如何替换玩家手上物品？
jd.bukkit.org 学会看 javadoc 对你有很大帮助的

replies.author: 苏丶小沫
replies.txt_content:
Player player = Bukkit.getPlayer(玩家名字);
player.getInventory().getItemInHand();
